title: OPL Split 2 Week 2 Tipping
body:
Hey everyone!

http://i.imgur.com/Y3WUesP.jpg

Split 2 Week 1 of the [Oceanic Pro League](http://oce.lolesports.com/schedule) is fast approaching!
I want to see who you think will win, check out the links below and put in your vote!
The tipping form will close at 5:30 pm AEDT on the 1st of June.

[Click here](http://goo.gl/forms/0HGc9jsRuh) to go to the tipping form

This week anyone that can pick **8 matches** correctly will get the **250 RP!** 

You can catch all the action at our [twitch channel](http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania) starting Monday 1st of June at 6pm AEDT

Comment below with what you picked and why!

replies.body:
Monday, 1st June
Pick the Winner! *

Pick the Winner! *

Pick the Winner! *

Pick the Winner! *

Thursday, 4th June
Pick the Winner! *

Pick the Winner! *

Pick the Winner! *

Pick the Winner! *

The game between Chiefs and Legacy is a hard one.
